inboundReferences.contextLine: Some services are replicated across several zones (eg: [[Azure SQL]]); Microsoft manages spreading requests across zones and the replication of data across zones. If an outage occurs in a single availability zone, Microsoft manages failover automatically. **Typically supported by [[paas]]**.
Azure DevTest Labs is a tool to create and manage [[iaas]] (like [[azure-virtual-machines]]) and [[paas]] (like [[azure-app-service]]) instances for dev and test environments.
Azure Container Instances is a [[paas]] service.
